page.title: 11ECOLOGY IN N.FERRIBY.
page.content: North Ferriby has a public house called,'The Duke of Cumberland' Some people would like another one because there isn't enough room.We have one fish and chip shop but people would like a Chinese takeaway. There is a conflict between those who wish to 'develope'the village and those who wish to 'conserve' it. Some residents object to the smell and noise of the local smelting works called,'Capper Pass' particularly as its chimney dominates the skyline. Others object to the smell of the local pig breeding unit. The danger is that in pursuit of more amenities and facilities, e.g. public toilets,the original simple village atmosphere will be swamped by a more sophisticated life style.
